channel.title: Community Update - Late May '19
channel.description:
We’ve made some great progress at the MESG Foundation over the last two weeks including the release of MESG Core 0.9.1, as well as important updates that pave the way towards our vision of a decentralized network of services. Read on to learn what we have been up to:

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/bi-weekly-news-05-06-19/
